action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: The image contains a purple plus sign, a green "H" shape, a pink "P" shape, an orange "L" shape, and a pink "T" shape. The shapes are arranged in a way that they form the word "HPLT".

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: There are seven Tetris blocks in the image. There is a purple "L" shape in the bottom right corner. There is a yellow "T" shape in the middle right. There is a yellow "J" shape below the yellow "T" shape. There is a red "T" shape to the left of the yellow "J" shape. There is an orange "T" shape in the top left. There is a red "L" shape above the orange "T" shape. There is a purple "U" shape above the red "L" shape. There is a red "U" shape to the right of the purple "U" shape.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains a purple plus sign, a green "H" shape, a pink "P" shape, an orange "L" shape, and a pink "T" shape. The shapes are arranged in a way that they form the word "HPLT".
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are any of the shapes in your image touching each other?

There is a yellow "J" shape below the yellow "T" shape. There is a red "T" shape to the left of the yellow "J" shape. There is an orange "T" shape in the top left. There is a red "L" shape above the orange "T" shape. There is a purple "U" shape above the red "L" shape. There is a red "U" shape to the right of the purple "U" shape.
QUESTION: Are any of the shapes in your image touching each other? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any shapes in your image that are the same color?

ANSWER: Yes.
QUESTION: Are there any shapes in your image that are the same color? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
